channel.title: Soindiana88 on Claire Radel Fans
channel.description: Recent content in Soindiana88 on Claire Radel Fans

item.title: How I should have handled my vision.
item.description: This is going to be the story of how I should have handled vision issues I have had at least since the 6th grade.

item.title: The trip
item.description: During the summer of 2017 17 year old incoming high school senior Sherman was flying to Florida for his annual visit to his grandparents on his Mom’s side.

item.description: In the summer of 88 15 year old sophomore to be Calvin was walking thru a mall in Indianapolis that closed in sometime later with his newly custodial Dad.

item.title: Sometimes you get too much of what you want.

item.title: Born almost blind but there is some hope.
item.description: I was born in 2000 and early in my childhood it was found I was almost blind.

item.title: My biggest vision and eyesight mistakes.
item.description: I’m 59 years old and I am going to list more or less in order the biggest mistakes I made regarding my vision going all the way back to the 60’s in grade school.

item.title: Wearing glasses while driving a racecar.
item.description: 15 year old Jordan comes from a family who loves stock car racing.

item.title: Family and friends vision.
item.description: In 1977 while a junior in high school I began seeing Jill who was the same age (17) as me and in the same grade.

item.title: I didn't want contacts then or now
item.description: In 2007 at age 7 I was prescribed my first pair of glasses for Myopia after failing the vision exam in the first grade.

item.title: 20 something wanting Lasik
item.description: A couple of years ago while in a large breakroom at work I used water and paper towels to clean my glasses.

item.description: A school vision screening at the end of his freshman year in 78 15 year old Mark was told he needed glasses.

item.description: In 1993 9 year old Geoff was prescribed glasses for mild Myopia with a prescription of -1 right and .

item.title: Putt Putt skins game.
item.description: In the 80’s and 90’s Southern Golf the parent company of Putt Putt started a skins game due to how popular it was on the PGA tour.

item.title: 20/20 vision and needing glasses.
item.description: During my senior year of high school in November 2017 I began having bad headaches.

item.description: I grew up in the 60’s and 70’s as I was born in 1959.

item.title: I always wanted glasses but have 20/20 vision.
item.description: In high school I was the only one out of my group of friends who did not wear glasses.

item.title: I didn't want glasses
item.description: As the 75-76 school year was coming to an end I was 15 year old male finishing my Sophomore year in Indianapolis.

item.title: Growing up with bad (sorta) vision.
item.description: I’m not saying my parents were bad but they relied on school vision exams.
